title: Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, Black (Packaging May Vary)
descriptions:
Introducing the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker, your ultimate solution for a quick and delicious coffee experience! This sleek, black coffee maker is designed with convenience and efficiency in mind, measuring just 8 inches wide to fit perfectly in your kitchen or office.

Choose from three brew sizes (6, 8, or 10 ounces) and enjoy your favorite K-Cup varieties, all brewed in under a minute! The generous 36-ounce removable water reservoir ensures you can brew multiple cups without refilling, saving you time and effort.

The Keurig K-Compact features Smart Start technology, allowing you to heat and brew in one simple process. With a user-friendly button control panel, enjoy your coffee just the way you like it, every time.

This coffee maker is not just fast and easy to use, but also energy-efficient. The auto-off feature automatically turns off your brewer after 2 hours of inactivity, helping you save energy.

The removable drip tray accommodates travel mugs up to 7 inches tall and holds a full accidental brew for easy clean-up. Plus, with the hot water dispense feature, you can also enjoy tea, hot cocoa, or instant soup anytime!

Please note that while the Keurig K-Compact is compatible with all K-Cup varieties, it does not support the My K-Cup Universal Reusable Coffee Filter. Packaging may vary, but the quality and performance of this exceptional coffee maker remain unchanged.

Upgrade your coffee routine with the Keurig K-Compact Single-Serve K-Cup Pod Coffee Maker today!
